description.zh-cn: 指两条由英格兰国会和苏格兰国会分别通过的国会法令，旨在将两国合并为大不列颠王国。
description.en: Refers to two Acts of Parliament passed by the Parliament of England and the Parliament of Scotland to unite the two kingdoms into the Kingdom of Great Britain.

description.zh-cn: 由英格兰国会通过的法令，旨在与苏格兰王国合并。
description.en: An Act passed by the Parliament of England for the union with the Kingdom of Scotland.

description.zh-cn: 由苏格兰国会通过的法令，旨在批准与英格兰王国的联合条约。
description.en: An Act passed by the Parliament of Scotland to ratify the Treaty of Union with the Kingdom of England.

description.zh-cn: 英格兰王国的立法机关，于1707年与苏格兰国会合并为大不列颠国会。
description.en: The legislature of the Kingdom of England, which merged with the Parliament of Scotland in 1707 to form the Parliament of Great Britain.

description.zh-cn: 苏格兰王国的立法机关，于1707年与英格兰国会合并为大不列颠国会。
description.en: The legislature of the Kingdom of Scotland, which merged with the Parliament of England in 1707 to form the Parliament of Great Britain.

description.zh-cn: 由英格兰和苏格兰代表签订的条约，为1707年联合法令奠定了基础。
description.en: The treaty signed by representatives of England and Scotland, which laid the foundation for the Acts of Union 1707.

description.zh-cn: 由英格兰王国和苏格兰王国根据1707年联合法令合并而成的单一王国。
description.en: A sovereign state in Western Europe, formed by the union of the Kingdom of England and the Kingdom of Scotland under the Acts of Union 1707.

description.zh-cn: 位于西欧的主权国家，于1707年与苏格兰王国合并为大不列颠王国。
description.en: A sovereign state in Western Europe, which united with the Kingdom of Scotland in 1707 to form the Kingdom of Great Britain.

description.zh-cn: 位于西欧的主权国家，于1707年与英格兰王国合并为大不列颠王国。
description.en: A sovereign state in Western Europe, which united with the Kingdom of England in 1707 to form the Kingdom of Great Britain.

description.zh-cn: 苏格兰和英格兰国王，首次将两国置于共主邦联之下，并试图推动两国合并。
description.en: King of Scotland and England, who first brought the two kingdoms under a personal union and attempted to promote their merger.

description.zh-cn: 英格兰女王，其去世导致詹姆士六世继承英格兰王位，形成共主邦联。
description.en: Queen of England, whose death led to James VI inheriting the English throne, forming a personal union.

description.zh-cn: 指英格兰和苏格兰在1603年至1707年期间共享同一君主但保持各自独立政府和议会的政治状态。
description.en: Refers to the political state from 1603 to 1707 where England and Scotland shared the same monarch but maintained separate governments and parliaments.

description.zh-cn: 由原英格兰国会和苏格兰国会于1707年合并而成的立法机关。
description.en: The legislature formed in 1707 by the merger of the former Parliament of England and Parliament of Scotland.

description.zh-cn: 英国历史学家。
description.en: British historian.

description.zh-cn: 英格兰、苏格兰和爱尔兰国王，其宗教政策是三国之战的导火索之一。
description.en: King of England, Scotland, and Ireland, whose religious policies were one of the triggers for the Wars of the Three Kingdoms.

description.zh-cn: 发生于17世纪中叶英格兰、苏格兰和爱尔兰的一系列武装冲突。
description.en: A series of armed conflicts in England, Scotland, and Ireland in the mid-17th century.

description.zh-cn: 1639年至1640年间英格兰与苏格兰之间的冲突，确立了苏格兰教会的长老制。
description.en: Conflicts between England and Scotland in 1639 and 1640, which established Presbyterianism in the Church of Scotland.

description.zh-cn: 17世纪苏格兰长老制支持者的政治和宗教运动，在主教战争后控制了苏格兰政权。
description.en: A 17th-century Scottish political and religious movement of Presbyterians who took control of Scotland after the Bishops' Wars.

description.zh-cn: 英格兰内战期间英格兰国会派的支持者。
description.en: Supporters of the Parliament of England during the English Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 1643年由苏格兰誓约派与英格兰国会派签订的协议，旨在建立军事同盟。
description.en: An agreement signed in 1643 between the Scottish Covenanters and the English Parliamentarians to establish a military alliance.

description.zh-cn: 英格兰军事及政治领袖，后成为英格兰、苏格兰和爱尔兰的护国公。
description.en: English military and political leader who later became Lord Protector of the Commonwealth of England, Scotland, and Ireland.

description.zh-cn: 英格兰、苏格兰和爱尔兰国王，于1660年复辟。
description.en: King of England, Scotland, and Ireland, restored to the throne in 1660.

zh-cn: 英格兰、苏格兰和爱尔兰共和国

description.zh-cn: 在英格兰内战后建立的共和国，由奥利弗·克伦威尔领导，期间将苏格兰并入其版图。
description.en: The republic established after the English Civil War, led by Oliver Cromwell, which incorporated Scotland into its territory.

description.zh-cn: 16至18世纪的欧洲共和国，是苏格兰当时最大的出口国。
description.en: A European republic from the 16th to 18th centuries, which was Scotland's largest export market at the time.

description.zh-cn: 1688年导致英格兰国王詹姆斯二世被其女玛丽二世和女婿威廉三世取代的事件。
description.en: The events of 1688 that led to the deposition of King James II of England and his replacement by his daughter Mary II and her husband William III.

description.zh-cn: 与妻子玛丽二世在光荣革命后共同成为英格兰及苏格兰的君主，支持两国政治联合。
description.en: Became joint monarch of England and Scotland with his wife Mary II after the Glorious Revolution, and supported the political union of the two kingdoms.

description.zh-cn: 与丈夫威廉三世在光荣革命后共同成为英格兰及苏格兰的君主，支持两国政治联合。
description.en: Became joint monarch of England and Scotland with her husband William III after the Glorious Revolution, and supported the political union of the two kingdoms.

description.zh-cn: 苏格兰王国在17世纪末的一次海外殖民计划，其灾难性的失败严重打击了苏格兰经济，成为推动联合的动因之一。
description.en: An overseas colonization project by the Kingdom of Scotland in the late 17th century, whose disastrous failure severely damaged the Scottish economy and became one of the motivations for the union.

description.zh-cn: 英格兰、苏格兰及爱尔兰女王，后成为大不列颠女王。在其任内，两国通过联合法令合并。
description.en: Queen of England, Scotland, and Ireland, later Queen of Great Britain. During her reign, the two kingdoms were united by the Acts of Union.

description.zh-cn: 英格兰国会通过的王位继承法案，规定王位由汉诺威王朝的新教成员继承。
description.en: An Act of the Parliament of England that settled the succession to the English throne on Protestant members of the House of Hanover.

description.zh-cn: 一个德意志王室，根据《1701年嗣位法令》继承了大不列颠王位。
description.en: A German royal dynasty that succeeded to the throne of Great Britain according to the Act of Settlement 1701.

description.zh-cn: 苏格兰国会通过的法案，规定其有权在安妮女王去世后选择与英格兰不同的继承人，促使英格兰寻求政治联合。
description.en: An Act of the Parliament of Scotland that gave it the right to choose a different successor from England after Queen Anne's death, prompting England to seek political union.

description.zh-cn: 17世纪末欧洲的一场大规模战争，期间的私掠行为影响了苏格兰经济。
description.en: A major war in late 17th-century Europe, during which privateering affected the Scottish economy.

description.zh-cn: 18世纪初欧洲的一场大规模战争，期间的私掠行为影响了苏格兰经济。
description.en: A major European conflict in the early 18th century, during which privateering affected the Scottish economy.

description.zh-cn: 18世纪初苏格兰国会中的一个亲英格兰、支持联合的政治派别。
description.en: A pro-English, pro-Union political faction in the Scottish Parliament in the early 18th century.

description.zh-cn: 18世纪初苏格兰国会中的一个政治派别，最终支持了联合条约。
description.en: A political faction in the Scottish Parliament in the early 18th century that ultimately supported the Treaty of Union.

id: 第二代昆斯伯里公爵詹姆斯·道格拉斯

zh-cn: 第二代昆斯伯里公爵詹姆斯·道格拉斯

description.zh-cn: 苏格兰贵族和政治家，积极推动联合条约通过。
description.en: Scottish nobleman and politician who actively promoted the passage of the Treaty of Union.

description.zh-cn: 英国的一个政治派别，在18世纪初反对与苏格兰合并。
description.en: A British political faction that opposed the union with Scotland in the early 18th century.

description.zh-cn: 18世纪初苏格兰国会中反对联合条约的派别。
description.en: The faction in the early 18th-century Scottish Parliament that opposed the Treaty of Union.

id: 第一代蒙罗斯公爵詹姆斯·格雷厄姆

zh-cn: 第一代蒙罗斯公爵詹姆斯·格雷厄姆

description.zh-cn: 苏格兰贵族，“飞行小队”成员，支持联合条约。
description.en: Scottish nobleman, member of the Squadrone Volante, and a supporter of the Treaty of Union.

id: 第一代罗克斯堡公爵约翰·克尔

zh-cn: 第一代罗克斯堡公爵约翰·克尔

description.zh-cn: 苏格兰贵族，“飞行小队”成员，支持联合条约。
description.en: Scottish nobleman, member of the Squadrone Volante, and a supporter of the Treaty of Union.

id: 第四代汉密尔顿公爵詹姆斯·汉密尔顿

zh-cn: 第四代汉密尔顿公爵詹姆斯·汉密尔顿

description.zh-cn: 苏格兰贵族，“国家党”成员，反对联合条约。
description.en: Scottish nobleman, member of the Country Party, and an opponent of the Treaty of Union.

id: 第二代贝翰文和斯坦顿勋爵约翰·汉密尔顿

zh-cn: 第二代贝翰文和斯坦顿勋爵约翰·汉密尔顿
en: John Hamilton, 2nd Lord Belhaven and Stenton

description.zh-cn: 苏格兰贵族，“国家党”成员，反对联合条约。
description.en: Scottish nobleman, member of the Country Party, and an opponent of the Treaty of Union.

description.zh-cn: 苏格兰作家及政治家，“国家党”成员，反对联合条约。
description.en: Scottish writer and politician, member of the Country Party, and an opponent of the Treaty of Union.

description.zh-cn: 苏格兰的国教。其国教地位在联合条约中得到保证，以换取其不再公开反对联合。
description.en: The national church of Scotland. Its status as the national church was guaranteed in the Treaty of Union in exchange for it no longer publicly opposing the union.
